subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Striker Emmanuel Adebayor headed in two goals in the final 17 minutes as Tottenham beat Swansea, 3-1, to close to a goal behind Arsenal for third place in England’s Premier League.
snippet: Striker Emmanuel Adebayor headed in two goals in the final 17 minutes as Tottenham beat Swansea, 3-1, to close to a goal behind Arsenal for third place in England’s Premier League.
